tool.name: genin2_2.1.2
tool.description: Genin2 predict genotypes for Influenza viruses beloning to the clade 2.3.4.4b H5Nx. For viruses collected in Europe since October 2020. This software is developped by the EURL.
tool.command: mkdir output_dir && <!-- Example: genin2 -o test.tsv EPI_ISL_18933204.fasta --> genin2 genin2 -o $output $formated_assembly python -m genin2 -o ./output.tsv $formated_fasta
tool.help:
**What it does** Predicts genotypes for Influenza viruses beloning to the clade 2.3.4.4b H5Nx. For viruses collected in Europe since October 2020.
